title: Code Cleanup - Unused Type Imports
description: Fix TS6196 unused type import warnings by removing or converting to type-only imports.

tasks.description: Clean up unused imports in SymbolNode.ts - Remove or convert unused 'Unit' type import to type-only import if needed for type checking
Clean up unused imports in concat.transform.ts and cumsum.transform.ts - Remove unused 'BigNumber' imports or convert to 'import type' syntax
Clean up unused imports in index.transform.ts - Remove or convert unused 'Range', 'BigNumber', 'Matrix' imports
Clean up unused imports in mapSlices.transform.ts - Remove unused 'BigNumber' import or convert to type-only import
Audit and fix remaining TS6196 errors - Search for any other unused type imports across the codebase and clean them up

acceptanceCriteria: Imports use 'import type' syntax where appropriate
